item.title: New Year - new focus
item.description: You can feel confident in drinking soy milk, says Hever. As for how much soy milk you can drink, she follows the American Institute for Cancer Research (AICR) recommendation of moderate soy consumption. … The AICR notes that research shows up to three servings a day has been found to be safe
